level.text: The Committee shall accept nominations for honorees from the District of Columbia and any state or territory of the United States.
The Committee shall select from the nominations received, persons to be recognized with commemorative markers in sidewalks designated in § 9-1215.06.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 258 of the New Columbia Statehood Initiative, Omnibus Boards and Commissions, and Election Transition Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-481, Nov. 18, 2014, 61 DCR 12133, 20 STAT 4405).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-98
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-98, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 9-1215.01.
